text: @Talkmaster Just pointing out that a lot of US doctors are Muslims. Also, the first doctors to die from Covid19 in the UK were all Muslim. Might just be a Muslim physician saves your life. Muslims even served in George Washington's Army. We've been a sleeper cell just waiting for ~250 yrs ;)
